{{- $styles := resources.Get "book.scss" | resources.ExecuteAsTemplate "book.scss" . | resources.ToCSS | resources.Minify | resources.Fingerprint }} {{- $searchJSFile := printf "%s.search.js" .Language.Lang }} {{- $searchJS := resources.Get "search.js" | resources.ExecuteAsTemplate $searchJSFile . | resources.Minify | resources.Fingerprint }}
